Lunch Time Activism

After the Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday protests, join us for lunch and community activism! This is a great opportunity to connect, recharge, and continue making a difference together.

  • Postcard writing to elected officials and community members
  • Collating materials and resources for immigrants
  • Planning future actions and sharing ideas
  • Building community and supporting each other

We will gather at a restaurant to be announced. Ordering food is not necessary. Bring your passion for justice. Letâ€™s keep the momentum going!
